translation.en: Let me see your other hand.
If I move this hand, I'm afraid my stomach will fall out.
I need to see your other hand.

translation.ko: - 그 손에 뭐 있어? - 아무것도 없어

translation.en: I miss the Cassie I was.
A totally normal high school girl.
I wonder what that Cassie would think of me now.
translation.ko: 그때의 난 지금의 나를 어떻게 생각할까?

translation.en: You know, he was supposed to be here.
Why are the hot ones always so unreliable?
What would I even say to him? I don't know him, and he doesn't even know me.
translation.ko: 걔가 오면 어쩌라고? 서로 잘 알지도 못해

translation.en: You're a girl. He's a boy.
What? You have something against pink?
No, no. I totally like it.
This is actually my sister's phone.
I dropped her off at a sleepover, and she took mine by mistake.
translation.ko: 친구 집까지 태워줬는데 내 폰과 바꿔 갔네

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I have it. No, I haven't looked at your text messages.
translation.ko: 그래, 내가 갖고 있어 네 문자 안 봤어

translation.en: but that was the last normal day of my life.
translation.ko: 내 평범한 삶이 그날로 끝날 줄...

translation.en: All of us are done for
When you're in high school, just about everything feels like the end of the world.
translation.ko: 고등학교 땐 모든 게 세상의 종말처럼 느껴진다

translation.en: An early curfew, a final exam...
Sullivan. What are we doing out here? Why not just tell her where you're gonna kick it?
translation.ko: 캐시 설리번, 어디로 찰 건지 아예 광고를 해라

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Look at this. It's so freaky.
That's it. You're done. Off the field.
No. But, look, it's really weird.
Give me your phone. Give me your phone.
translation.ko: 네 폰 좀 보여줘 내 건 안 돼, 폰 줘봐

translation.en: Turns out, what we thought was the end of the world
What, did someone famous die or something?
It appears to be metallic and of a considerable size.
Across the world, social media has been awash with panic and speculation
translation.ko: 이 충격적인 영상이 퍼지면서 각국 SNS엔 온갖 추측이

translation.en: as these images spread like wildfire.
The president has authorized NASA to attempt communication with the object
translation.ko: NASA는 대통령 재가를 받아 현재 미 대륙 상공에서

translation.en: BREAKING NEWS MESSAGE FROM THE WHITE HOUSE that is now circling our planet
and is currently over the United States, moving west over Ohio.
Oh, my God. It's right over us.
-Wait, what is that? -I have no idea.
There were no messages from our galactic party crashers during the first ten days.
translation.ko: 첫 열흘간은 외계의 불청객들로부터 아무 메시지도 없었다

translation.en: But pretty soon, they had a name.
They say they don't feel safe so close to the city.
Lizbeth: Guess who's sitting right behind me...
Everybody look at the equation on the board.
will tell him yr avail for end-of-world sex
Who can give me the derivative of X?
I'm sure this is just a power outage.
The Others hit us with an electromagnetic pulse that killed all the power on the planet.
translation.ko: 디 아더스는 전자기파로 지구의 모든 전력을 차단했다

translation.en: No more everything we took for granted.
That was the last time I saw Ben Parish.
translation.ko: 벤 패리시를 본 건 그게 마지막이었다

translation.en: Like everyone else in that room.
Here, Sam. Grab me another, okay? Thank you.
At the time, we thought that was it.
Come on, Sam. It's an earthquake!
Just keep your head down, okay?
Come here. Hold on to me.
In Ohio, we only had the lake to worry about.
There are over 300 billion birds in the world.
Mom said the avian flu was already one of the world's deadliest viruses.
translation.ko: 엄만 조류 인플루엔자가 인류 최악의 전염병이라고 했다

translation.en: In the 3rd Wave, the Others modified it.
translation.ko: 그 조류 인플루엔자가 저들의 제3 침공 때

translation.en: And the birds spread it across the planet.
Line A. Line A is for those who have already been assessed.

translation.en: If you're waiting to be assessed, then proceed to Line B.
I should be on the area that isn't quarantined!
-It's okay. I didn't even touch her. -It is not okay. You can't be here.
translation.ko: - 건들지도 않았어요 - 여기 있으면 안 돼

translation.en: Sweetheart, I need you to go home and look after Sammy, okay?
But, Mom, I wanna help you here.
-I know. Can you get her out of here now? -I wanna help.
translation.ko: - 나도 돕고 싶어요 - 알아 얘 좀 내보내 줄래요?

translation.en: Miss, you gotta leave. Let's go.
Some people were immune to the virus.
And a few people got sick and somehow recovered.
Why don't they just get it over with?
I think a better question is, "What do they need?"
They've been very careful so far not to damage it any more than absolutely necessary.
translation.ko: 여태까진 최대한 덜 망가뜨리려고 조심한 거야

translation.en: I think that's why they're here, Cassie.
Ready to walk for a while, Sammy?
Dad, how far is it to the refugee camp?
Just a few miles. We should be there by nightfall.
translation.ko: 몇 km 거리야 저녁엔 도착할 거다

translation.en: -Dad, look. Is this it? -Yeah, buddy. I think so.
translation.ko: - 아빠, 저기예요? - 응, 그런 것 같다

translation.en: Latrines are off to the left.
How many people are there here?
I don't know how many we got now.
When's the last time you had a hot meal?
This button changes out the clip.
You're gonna carry this with you at all times,
you're not gonna tell anybody you have it,
and you're only gonna use it if it's life or death. You got it?
I thought we were safe here.
You gotta get the weeds, guys.
What is that? I don't know. Come on.
-What's going on? -All right, just take it easy.
I thought the cars didn't work.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am Colonel Vosch of the United States Army.
My men and I are from the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
Let's get you people out of here.
We should be ready to go at a moment's notice, all right? Stay with your sister, Sam.
translation.ko: 바로 떠날 준비해 누나 옆에 있어, 샘

translation.en: -Come on. -You can go right on the bus.
Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
Children, please move to the buses for transport.
Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
Do you think they have electricity if the trucks are working?
I don't know. Why, you still have a phone?
My orders are to get just the kids onto the bus.
Well, those might be your orders, but they're my kids.
-Yeah. -So we're gonna stay together. -We'll wait for another bus. -It's okay, Private.
translation.ko: - 우린 함께 딴 차 탈게요 - 됐어, 이병

translation.en: Look, you're welcome to keep 'em here with you if you want,
but if they were my kids, I'd get 'em on that bus.
We have reason to believe there's an imminent threat to this location.
We're trying to get everyone to safety as quickly as we can,
and this is the only working transport we've got, so we're taking shifts based on need.
translation.ko: 버스는 저거 한 대라 애들부터 옮긴 뒤

translation.en: Kids first, then we come back for the rest of ya.
Well, how safe is it at Wright-Patterson?
Safest place there is right now.
And the buses will just come right back?
Like I said, it's your call.
Just 'cause some man in uniform tries to tell us what to do
doesn't mean we actually have to follow his orders.
Okay, I want you on this one, all right?
-I'll be right behind you. -We can't split up.
And we're gonna have dinner tonight. We're going to the same place.
It's the Army, okay? This is our Army. It's fine. It's gonna be okay.
-Don't leave me alone. -All right. Come here.
Take care of your brother. All right? Come here.
I want you to listen to your sister, all right? -Okay. -She's in charge.
translation.ko: 누나 말 잘 들어 누나가 네 보호자야

translation.en: I'll be there before you know it.
Here, head to the back, Sam.
-I forgot Bear! I need to go get him! -Sam, stop. Sit down.
-It's okay. What's up? -I can't. I can't go without him.
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? - 곰돌이 두곤 못 가

translation.en: All right, all right, all right. I'll go get him, okay?
Yeah, I'll be right back. I promise.
This way. Down to the mess hall. In the mess hall now, please.
Bear, Bear, Bear. Bear, Bear, Bear, Bear.
Can I have your attention, please?
If you'll all just quiet down.
We believe the 4th Wave has begun.
The Others have come down off their ship.
Apparently, they have the ability to inhabit human hosts
What we do know is they have snipers in these woods, and they are targeting survivors.
translation.ko: 숲에서 놈들의 저격수가 생존자를 노리고 있습니다

translation.en: We've got intel that would suggest some of them could be right here in this very camp.
translation.ko: 제보에 의하면 이 캠프 안에도 있을지 몰라요

translation.en: So, what... Are you saying that some of us are Others?
translation.ko: 이 중의 일부는 디 아더스라는 말인가요?

translation.en: Please. There's a lot we still don't know.
We can detect them in children.
Unfortunately, the screening procedure for adults is a bit more complicated.
translation.ko: 그런데 어른 몸을 검사하는 게 더 까다로워요

translation.en: I know. I know you all wanna get back to your families.
Unfortunately, we're gonna have to move you all to a secure holding facility
translation.ko: 하지만 일단 여러분을 안전한 곳에 억류하고

translation.en: so they can run some screening protocols. Folks, please!
You need to understand, there is no way to differentiate us from the Others
translation.ko: 디 아더스를 색출해 내려면 철저한 검사밖엔 방법이 없습니다

translation.en: The sooner we get you screened, the sooner we can get you back to your families.
translation.ko: 빨리 끝내야 가족을 빨리 만날 수 있어요

translation.en: I am not an Other, okay? I'm not going anywhere.
translation.ko: 난 외계인이 아니오 아무 데도 안 가

translation.en: Sir, no one's saying that you are.
This is the reality of our situation.
Now, if you'd just calm down.
Let me out of here. Get out of my way. Watch out.
You can't keep me in here!
-Everybody, just calm down! -Let me out now!
-I wanna see my kids! -Put it down!
Support team members, meet arrivals on the tarmac.
Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.ko: 빨간 원 안에 서 있다가 번호 부르면 나가

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.ko: 빨간 원 안에 서 있다가 번호 부르면 나가

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
Mom and Dad killed by the virus.
But it didn't kill you, did it?
That where the nickname came from?
You get to help avenge her death.
This puts out a signal that we can track.
You kids are the most important thing right now.
translation.ko: 이젠 너희가 우리의 가장 중요한 병력이야

translation.en: We need every one of you to help us fight the Others.
This isn't summer camp, Zombie. You're a soldier now.
translation.ko: 이건 여름 캠프가 아니야, 좀비 넌 이제 군인이야

translation.en: So we don't wanna lose you. Stand up.
How are we supposed to fight the Others if we don't even know what they are?
Don't worry. He won't be able to see us.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 놈은 우릴 못 봐

translation.en: I know. It's impossible to tell.
The Others infest real humans like some sort of parasite.
translation.ko: 디 아더스는 기생충처럼 사람 몸에 들어가서

translation.en: Take over their minds, their bodies.

translation.ko: 약, 방사선, 수술 어떤 거로도 제거가 안 돼

translation.en: The only way to kill 'em is to kill the host.
You just need to destroy the thing inside him.
translation.ko: 넌 저 안의 그놈만 없애면 돼

translation.en: If you're gonna be on my squad,
I need to know that you will do whatever it takes to...
translation.ko: 내 분대에 들어오려면 증명해야 해 네가 무슨 일이든 할 수 있...

translation.en: Here's how you kill off a species.
First, you take out the easy ones, the weak, the exposed.
Kill them as efficiently as possible.
That was the first three Waves.
But even if you bug bomb a house, there's always a few cockroaches left.
translation.ko: 하지만 집을 소독해도 바퀴벌레 몇 마린 남는 법

translation.en: Now, we are like those cockroaches.
And the Others are picking us off.
And because the Others look like us,
How do you rid the world of humans?
First, you rid the humans of their humanity.
"When I was a child, I spoke as a child.
I thought and I reasoned as a child.
But when I became a man,
Those words never meant more to me than they do right now,
translation.ko: 이 말이 어느 때보다 와 닿는 순간이군

translation.en: The best and brightest vision of who we are and what we're fighting for.
translation.ko: 우리의 찬란한 비전이고 지켜야 할 가치지

translation.en: Our intelligence tells us the Others are readying themselves for a final attack.
translation.ko: 첩보에 의하면 놈들은 최후의 일격을 준비하고 있다

translation.en: What form it will take, we do not know.
there will be no more Waves.
Humanity as we know it will be wiped from the face of the Earth.
I'm gonna tell you some things I know.
So with whatever time we have left,
you will learn to think, speak,
move and fight like the soldiers you are.
Let the weight of our loss fuel you.
Let the weight of our dead embolden you.
Let the weight of our hope drive you to victory.
Where's my gun? Where's my gun?
translation.ko: 어디 갔지? 내 총 어디 갔어?

translation.en: How the hell do you know my name?
You were bleeding on the highway. I brought you back here, to my house.
translation.ko: 도로에 피 흘리며 쓰러져 있길래 집으로 데려왔지

translation.en: All right, when you found me on the highway, I had my gun. Where is it?
-Don't touch me! Don't touch me! Don't... -Your leg.
-This is gonna hurt. -All right. Just do it. Just do it.
How long have I been here?
How far is Wright-Patterson from here?
All right, we're not safe anywhere anymore.
Why did you wanna know how close Wright-Patterson was?
translation.ko: 라이트 패터슨까지의 거리는 왜 물어본 거야?

translation.en: The Army took him there, so I...
I need to get him back.
You gotta get your strength back.
The way everything's happened, I guess it just makes me feel more...
translation.ko: 덕분에 나 자신이 좀 다르게 느껴져

translation.en: And you need help with that?
Don't you tell him my card.
Hey, I've been getting pretty lucky, and this isn't my first time playing.
translation.ko: 나 계속 이겼어 포커 한두 번 해보냐?

translation.en: By the way, I heard the new guy coming in got kicked out of their last squad.
translation.ko: 새로 오는 애 먼저 팀에서 쫓겨난 거래

translation.en: What's his name? The name's Ringer.
translation.ko: - 그 남자애 이름이 뭔데? - 이름은 링어다

translation.en: I was the leader of my last squad.
So the guy I replace went Section 8. Why?
I heard it's 'cause this squad's so bad
he was afraid you'd get him killed when the 5th Wave hits.
and I'll rip your throats out.
I'm not taking orders from you. I'm not gonna die with you geniuses.
translation.ko: 난 네 명령 안 들어 같이 개죽음당할 생각 없어

translation.en: If anyone in this barrack touches me, I'll kill them.
translation.ko: 누구든 내 몸에 손대면 죽여버릴 거야

translation.en: I like to play chess. Do you play?
translation.ko: 나 체스 좋아하는데 할 줄 알아?

translation.en: But if you wanna play some strip poker later--
You had my gun the whole time! Why'd you lie?
translation.ko: 내 총을 갖고 있었으면서 왜 속였죠?

translation.en: I was afraid you'd shoot me.
For all I knew, you were an Other.
They're using those drones to hunt down survivors.

translation.ko: 사람이 많은 라이트 패터슨 같은 곳은

translation.en: You think that Sammy's already dead?
He's alive, and I'm gonna go get him.
You're not gonna make it very far on your own.
You know what? Screw you, Evan. -I don't need you. I don't need anyone. -Cassie, come on.
translation.ko: 웃기지 마요 난 누구 도움도 필요 없어요

translation.en: -If you go, I'll just follow you. -Actually, no. If I need someone to carve a cane for me...
You can't stop me. How are you gonna stop me?
I don't know. Maybe I'll shoot you!
What, like you shot that guy with the crucifix?
-I didn't think you were gonna live. -Don't touch me!
translation.ko: - 난 네가 죽을 줄... - 손대지 마요!

translation.en: I can't promise what you'll find, but I will get you there.
This is a waste of time.
Those kids are gonna be dead before their boots hit the ground.
Especially with you as squad leader.
You don't know anything about me.
You did good in school, had a bunch of friends. You probably played football.
translation.ko: 공부 잘했고 친구도 많았겠고 풋볼도 했겠네

translation.en: You might have even been team captain.
And then, all of a sudden, it wasn't.
No one to get weak-kneed at that pretty smile.
You weren't ready for the end of the world.
translation.ko: 넌 종말을 맞을 준비가 안 됐었어

translation.en: And I was doing fine out there on my own.
Till they forced me onto their stupid school bus.
We didn't get rescued, dumbass. We got drafted.
you teach us how to shoot.

translation.ko: 목걸이 귀엽네 여친 거야, 여동생 거야?

translation.en: Can you teach me that thing where you took the gun out of my hand?
translation.ko: 총 뺏을 때의 그 동작 좀 가르쳐 줄래요?

translation.en: Let's just leave any potential disarming to me,
translation.ko: 무기 뺏거나 하는 건 그냥 내가 할게

translation.en: -all right? -No. No, I need to be ready.
You don't have to be tough all the time.
I promised Sam that I would be there for him, no matter what.
translation.ko: 샘한테 꼭 데리러 간다고 약속했단 말이에요

translation.en: I made that promise to him.
Okay. Grab the barrel of the gun with your left,
and with your right, snap my hand away.
Hey, you're not gonna hurt me. All right. Like that, but stronger.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 안 다쳐 그보다 더 세게

translation.en: Now at the end, you'll grab my wrist and pull it toward you.
translation.ko: 그런 다음 내 손목을 잡아당기는 거야

translation.en: Okay. Don't be so scared of your weapon.
You gotta think that the gun is a part of you.
Not the gun firing, you firing.
Zombie, the Colonel wants to see you, now.
Simultaneous attacks on the last of our metropolitan areas.
A full-on invasion. This is it.
translation.ko: 전면 공습이지, 올 게 온 거야

translation.en: Here, I want to show you something.
These employ the same technology as the detector viewer from medical.
We've improved it. Made it mobile.
The idea is to allow our soldiers in the field to instantly differentiate between friend and foe.
translation.ko: 이걸 쓰면 적과 아군을 즉시 구분할 수 있어

translation.en: You look at the enemy through this and it lights 'em up green.
We can see them before they know they've been seen. We take back the advantage.
translation.ko: 적보다 한발 앞서 볼 수 있으니까 유리하지

translation.en: The only thing left to do now is test the optics in live conditions.
Which is why tomorrow at 2100, I'm sending four squads into battle equipped with these helmets.
translation.ko: 내일 21시, 4개 분대가 이걸 쓰고 전투에 나간다

translation.en: Your squad will be among those four.
Bring that squad back in one piece.
Yeah. Actually, you know, she was...
I really wish you hadn't read my journal.
I can't wait to meet him.
How do you know without a compass?
You know, I can make one out of a pin and a glass of water.
translation.ko: 핀과 물 한 컵만 있으면 만들 수 있는데...

translation.en: Didn't peg you for a Girl Scout.
I've never been a huge fan of the outdoors.
translation.ko: 원래 난 야외에 잘 안 나와

translation.en: I had a scholarship to Kent State.
Zombie, are they really sending us to fight?
Just go to sleep, all right?
But my sister called me Sams.
All of us are done for
Could you guys please shut up?
We live in a beautiful world
Yeah, we do Yeah, we do
We live in a beautiful world
Infiltrate enemy hornet's nest, verify enemy and terminate.
translation.ko: 적진 중앙에 침투 적을 확인 사살합니다

translation.en: Remember, the Others light up green in your visors.
translation.ko: 명심해 디 아더스는 녹색 불로 보인다

translation.en: At mission complete, signal for extraction.
Holy shit, it's working. You guys, I got two of 'em straight ahead.
translation.ko: 야, 진짜 보인다, 앞에 두 놈 있어

translation.en: TARGET DETECTED And I heard it. I was right there.
I peed. I definitely just peed.
-They're over here, too! -Run for the alley!
Don't do that! Don't scare me like that!
Down, down! Now, now! Down, down, down! Oompa's been shot!
Don't be dead. Come on, man. Don't be dead! Please don't be dead!
We can't stay here. They'll be back.
That alleyway. We'll have cover there.
translation.ko: 저 골목에 숨을 곳이 있을 거야

translation.en: If we're out in the open that long they'll pick us off one by one.
translation.ko: 가는 동안 한 명씩 사살될 거야

translation.en: When I tell you to run, run as fast as you can.
On my go, haul ass to the alleyway.
Back out there? Are you crazy?
Listen, Teacup, you just gotta trust me, okay? You're gonna run and don't look back.
translation.ko: 티컵, 날 믿어야 해 돌아보지 말고 뛰어

translation.en: -What about Oompa? -He's dead, man. We gotta leave him.
I'd hug you if I didn't think you'd punch me in the nuts for it.
Okay, so what do we do now?
They knock planes out of the sky and cause earthquakes,
but they're afraid of an army of children?
There's something Vosch isn't telling us.
Okay, I'm not risking my life for this.
I'm better out there on my own.
If you know what's best for you, you'll do the same.
-Holy shit! What the hell is this? -Zombie, you see this?
You're one of them! You're an alien!
What are you talking about? I just saved your asses!
If she's one of them, we have to take her out now. Poundcake, just calm down, all right?
I can see it inside of her!
-Zombie, what do we do? Do we shoot her? -It's your call, Zombie.
-Oh, my God! What's going on, man? -Come on, man.
Hey. Put your guns down. Put your guns down.
Don't shoot. Calm down. She's not an Other. Neither am I.
translation.ko: 쏘지 마, 얘도 나도 외계인 아니야

translation.en: Come on, Dumbo. You know who I am. Put the guns down.
translation.ko: 덤보, 너 나 알잖아, 총 내려놔

translation.en: Just put 'em down! I'm not an Other.
I don't even think any of those people out there shooting at us are Others.
Green doesn't mean alien. Green means human.
Those lenses, these trackers, it's all fake, man.
translation.ko: 이 렌즈나 추적 장치... 다 가짜야

translation.en: It's an illusion. It's a trick. They weren't testing these. They were testing us.
translation.ko: 이걸 테스트하는 게 아니라 우릴 테스트하는 거라고

translation.en: They were seeing how we would do, how we would hold up under pressure.
All right? If we would do what we were trained to do.
-To kill Others! -No, to kill the survivors, man!
translation.ko: - 적을 죽이는지? - 아니, 생존자를 죽이는 거지

translation.en: Well, what about the guys outside, the ones that were shooting at us?
Why would the Army want us to kill other humans?
And because we're kids, they thought they could manipulate us into doing their dirty work.
translation.ko: 어린 우릴 시켜 더러운 일을 처리하는 거지
우린 제5 침공에 맞서는 게 아니야

translation.en: We go AWOL. This means we can't go back. You know that, right?
translation.ko: 그럼 무단이탈이 돼서 기지에 못 돌아가

translation.en: I left him back at the base.
-No, man. I gotta go back. -You can't just wander back in there.
I'll put the tracker back in. They'll pick me up.
translation.ko: 추적 장치를 다시 넣으면 데리러 올 거야

translation.en: You guys go ahead. I will meet up with you later.
Dumbo, where can I take a bullet in the torso and not die?
translation.ko: 덤보, 가슴 어딜 맞아야 안 죽지?
농담해? 어딜 맞아야 해? 부상한 거로 보여야

translation.en: Where can I take a bullet in the torso? I gotta make it look real.
translation.ko: 어딜 맞아야 해? 부상한 거로 보여야

translation.en: It's the only way I'm getting back in alive.
It's impossible, man. There's too many organs.
Ringer, she can make the shot, all right? I know she can.
translation.ko: 링어가 잘 쏠 수 있어 쟤 총 잘 쏴

translation.en: You want me to shoot you?
Don't pretend like you haven't thought about it.
Where do you want me to shoot him?
You're out of your drone sector.
Put the gun down. Stay away.
If I was gonna kill you, Cassie, I would've done it a long time ago.
You're one of them. You're a fucking Other.
This isn't the first time the Others have been here.
They came before and created sleeper agents, like me.
translation.ko: 그러곤 나 같은 잠복 스파이를 만들었지

translation.en: Growing up, there was this voice in my head.
It was quiet, but it was there.
it was like a switch was flipped inside me,
translation.ko: 내 속의 스위치가 켜진 거 같았지

translation.en: How many people have you killed?
The disease that the Others created. The disease that you created.
translation.ko: 전염병도 디 아더스가 퍼뜨렸지 당신이 퍼뜨린 거야

translation.en: Our kind believe that love is just a trick.
A way to protect your genetic future.
It was like you flipped the switch back.
You made me wanna be human again.
translation.ko: 날 다시 사람이 되고 싶게 했거든

translation.en: They're wrong. Love's not a trick. It's real.
translation.ko: 저들의 말은 거짓이야 사랑은 속임수가 아니야

translation.en: I know now because of you.
I don't wanna hear any more.
Cassie, please, just let me help you.
All I wanna do is help you find Sam.
All right. Get on your knees, Evan.
All right. Come on, just get on your knees.
The Army is controlled by the Others.
All right, copy that, Tango Three.
The rest of the squad are reported KIA.
Ma'am, it's all right. It's all right. We've got you.
Any family not known to be dead?
You know why you're here, Cassie?
We tried to move to cover, but as soon as we did...
-I took a bullet, sir. -But you survived.
the way that bullet went right through you and managed to...
You drop your lie, and I'll drop mine.
translation.ko: 네가 솔직히 말하면 나도 솔직히 말할게

translation.en: You're gonna kill me, aren't you?
What's the point of any of this?
Other than occupy a space we need.
translation.ko: 우리에게 필요한 별에 산다는 거 말고는

translation.en: We're not that different, Ben. Your kind would do exactly the same thing.
translation.ko: 너희도 우리 입장이면 똑같이 했을 거야

translation.en: Our kind wouldn't have wiped out an entire species.
translation.ko: 우리라면 한 종족을 말살하진 않을 거야

translation.en: Of course you would. You've been doing it for centuries.
translation.ko: 너희도 그랬을 거야 수 세기간 그래왔잖아

translation.en: There's more. Three guards were killed at the west gate...
An explosion, sir. It came from inside the base.
-Get rid of him. -Damage to Sector Three!
We need to move all the recruits off-base. Get 'em on planes to Wonderland now.
Deploy units. Find out who's attacking us.
They're taking out our security cameras.
Bring the drones home so we can see who's attacking us.
-Don't move! Don't move! -It's okay! Okay, all right!
Cassie? My name's Ben Parish. We used to go to high school together.
translation.ko: 캐시? 나 벤 패리시야 같은 고등학교 다녔던...

translation.en: I'm looking for my brother, Sam.
-You know my brother? -Yes, we're in the same squad.
-You know where he is? -I'm trying to get to him.
All recruits report to the transport area.
They're sending the kids off to war. Vosch. The Army. They're Others.
translation.ko: 애들을 전장에 내보내고 있어 군이 디 아더스야

translation.en: Look, Sam is about to get on one of those planes.
If we don't go now, you're not gonna see him again. You understand?
translation.ko: 지금 안 가면 영영 걔 못 봐

translation.en: -Recruits report to the transport area. -All right.
Once the recruits reach Wonderland, get them ready for immediate deployment.
translation.ko: 그곳에 도착 즉시 전투 투입 준비시켜

translation.en: No, it's fine. He's one of us. It's okay.
Evan, what are you doing here?
I told you not to follow me.
Well, I decided to ignore you.
In about ten minutes, when the last plane full of kids takes off,
I'm taking this place down, for good.
I'm sorry I lied to you, Cassie.
I was wrong when I said I was both one of you and one of them.
translation.ko: 내가 양쪽 다라고 말한 건 사실이 아니야

translation.en: You can't be both. You have to choose.
translation.ko: 둘 다가 될 순 없어 한쪽을 택해야만 해

translation.en: I think Evan Walker's about to blow this place up.
Proceed to the transport vehicles in a calm and orderly fashion.
-Stay with your group leader. -Keep it moving.
translation.ko: 팀 리더와 함께 움직여라 계속 가

translation.en: -Don't fall behind, everyone. -Where do they think they're going?
translation.ko: - 속도 맞춰서! - 너 왜 줄 안 서?

translation.en: Once you are on the plane, you will receive further instructions.
translation.ko: 탑승 후, 또 다른 지시가 있을 것이다

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
I missed you so much, Sam.
Look what I brought back for you.
I gotta take his tracker out. All right? It's not gonna hurt, okay?
translation.ko: 얘 추적기를 빼야 해 별로 안 아플 거야

translation.en: Power up my bird. Last plane's in the air, evacuate the base.
translation.ko: 헬기 시동 걸어 우리도 철수 준비하자

translation.en: Run, run! Go for the truck.
-Quick, Sammy. Get in! -All right, come on! Get in! Get in!
Make sure you give her the food first.
Let me know if it starts hurting or anything like that.
It's a little early, isn't it?
You were named after a star, right?
I was named after Ben & Jerry's.
translation.ko: 내 이름은 아이스크림 가게를 딴 거야

translation.en: Nothing made my dad happier than ice cream.
I'm sure you made him happier.
We have to save those other kids.
How are we gonna do that?
and just go get something to eat.
Come on, lazy bones. Put your bear down, would you?
The Others see our hope as a weakness,
It's our hope that lets us survive.
That lets us bend, but remain unbroken.
translation.ko: 역경과 맞서 싸울 수 있게 해준다

translation.en: -You two knew each other? -Yeah, we went to high school together.
It's our hope that will let us win one day.
translation.ko: 희망이 있기에 우린 이길 수 있다

translation.en: It's our hope that makes us human.
translation.ko: 희망이 있기에 우린 인간일 수 있다
